name: Ilmalia Putri
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: Bingung mau ngomong apa sebenernya :' but I feel so lucky to be in love with you and in this special day, I just want to say Happy 20th Birthday. I wish you all the best and hope all your dreams come true. Cuma bisa ngomong itu si akuu
